warning_info.en: {user} has {num} warnings. More info can be found at {url}
warning_info.fr: {user} a {num} avertissements. Plus d'informations peuvent être trouvées ici : {url}
warning_info.it: {user} a {num} avvertenze. Ulteriori informazioni si trovano a {url}

warn_notify.en: Attention: {warner} has issued a warning to {warnee} for "{reason}." More info can be found at {url}
warn_notify.fr: Attention : {warner} a donné un avertissement à {warnee} pour "{reason}.". Plus d'informations peuvent être trouvées ici : {url}
warn_notify.it: Attenzione : {warner} ha dato un' avvertenza a {warnee} per "{reason}.". Ulterior informazioni si trovano a {url}
